addOrUpdateWrapper(bytes32,(address,addr.details: This function can reset a verifier wrapper back to address(0)

params.nexusAppIDFrom: The chain ID to set the wrapper for

params.receiptHash: The hash of the message receipt
The hash of the message receipt

params._nexusAppID: The unique identifier for this Nexus application

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.chainblockNumber: The block number from the source chain
params.proof: The proof verifying the authenticity of the message
params.receipt: The message receipt containing all message details

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendMessage(bytes32[],address[],uint256,.details: We take nonce from the msg.sender since they manage and create deterministic receipt structures

params.nexusAppIDTo: Array of destination Nexus application IDs

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addOrUpdateWrapper(bytes32,(address,addr.notice: Adds or updates a verifier wrapper for a specific chain

getSendMessage(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the details of a sent message

messages(bytes32).notice: Tracks whether a message hash has been processed

nexusAppID().notice: The unique identifier for this Nexus application

receiveMessage(uint256,(bytes32,bytes32[.notice: Receives and processes a cross-chain message

sendMessage(bytes32[],address[],uint256,.notice: Sends a cross-chain message to one or more destinations

verifiedMessages(bytes32).notice: Stores verified message receipts by their hash
